metadata.title: CVE-2021-25292 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.1.1. The PDF parser allows a regular expression DoS (ReDoS) attack via a crafted PDF file because of a catastrophic backtracking regex.

criterions.comment: pillow package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.2-1').
